Hi, I'm Sam.

I'm a web developer and designer, a geographer with a map problem, and an avid open source contributor. I'm a 2015 Fellow with Code for America and the lead designer & co-founder of Situated Laboratories.

I hack with the great people of CUGOS and am also an editor of the Atlas of Design. This is my portfolio and space for experiments.
